channel.title: Ready to Launcher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ready to Launcher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Apple’s New Spotlight Compares to Raycast
item.description: The new Spotlight launcher tool coming to macOS this year looks and works a lot like the indie application Raycast. Here’s what they can both do, and how they differ.
